description: The HH_MEDS_ADDL_INFO table contains information specific to Home Health/Hospice medications. This includes the hospice coverage status of a medication.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the order record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN
columns.description: The item stores the patient (EPT) contact serial number (CSN) associated with the update to the order's additional info.

columns.name: ENTRY_EMP_ID
columns.description: Stores the user that updated an order's additional info

columns.name: ENTRY_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the instant that the additional information was synchronized from the Remote Client

columns.name: HSPC_CVG_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the hospice coverage status of a medication which helps to determine if the Hospice is responsible for paying for a medication


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Hospice Covered


Not Hospice Covered

columns.name: TAKING_DIFF_POC_YN
columns.description:
Stores whether or not for this order (ORD) that the patient taking different sig should be pulled on to the Plan of Care (POC).


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: HSPC_NONCVRD_MED_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column contains the reason why a medication is not covered by the hospice benefit.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Other
